name: Taboo Typewriter
description:
Taboo Typewriter is a game where you put your typing and word knowledge to the test. 

Start typing words, every time you complete a word you are awarded points equal to the number of letters in that word, then that word is added to a Taboo list. If you retype that word, you will lose points. But to make things harder, every so often, a letter is made Taboo. and if you type that letter, you will lose points. After each round, the Taboo Letters are Reset, but the words continue to pile up. Try to get as many points as you can by the end.

Challenge Friends to see who gets the highest Score.

Tips:
*Try typing sentences to start with. 
*If you find words you cannot type because of Taboo Letters, save them for the next round.
